
```{r}
data <- fread(here::here("data/in/hgbif_completo_iucn.csv"))
data <- data[!is.na(data$correctname)]

coord <- data[,.(X,Y,correctname)]


mx <- ne_countries(scale = "large",returnclass = "sf", country = "Mexico")[,"geometry"]

grid <- st_make_grid(mx, cellsize = c(0.5,0.5), square = T, crs = 4326)
mx_grid <- st_intersection(mx,grid)
mx_grid$id_cell <- 1:nrow(mx_grid)
mx_grid$value <- 1


terra::rasterize(vect(mx))


plot(mx_grid)
```
